price: 65. Sur Mes serviteurs, en vérité, tu n’as aucune autorité. Que ton Seigneur suffise pour être leur Protecteur ! »
arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِي لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٞۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna ʿibādī laysa laka ʿalayhim sul'ṭānun wakafā birabbika wakīlan
